overview:
At Grazitti Interactive, we leverage technology for driving Marketing and Products for customers across the globe. Leveraging both open source LAMP stack and Microsoft DOTNET platforms for websites, webapplications and SAAS products.

We use community platforms like Joomla, Drupal, Salesforce, Jive and Nationbuilder to build some of the most compelling customer communities including m2m and Marketo on both the web and mobile.

We help product companies build their product by leveraging offshore engineering, manual and automated testing, and documentation resources who work seamlessly as extensions of internal teams.

For Marketing folks we leverage our creative and technology teams to conceive, design, implement and operate search, automation and banner campaigns on platforms like Marketo, Acton, Google AdWords, Adsense, Doubleclick amongst others.
